description: Technology enthusiast committed to growth. Skilled in front-end development, project leadership, and agile methodologies. Excellent at problem-solving with clear communication and quick adaptability.

headerInfo.description: Computer Systems Engineer. Technology enthusiast committed to growth. Skilled in front-end development, project leadership, and agile methodologies. Excellent at solving complex problems and driving technological innovation.

bioInfo.description: I am a computer systems engineer specialized in digital transformation and user experience. I combine technical skills with a UX/UI approach to design user-centered solutions that optimize processes and improve digital interaction. Passionate about technological innovation and the application of AI in digital experiences.
bioInfo.especialidad: Specialized in Digital Transformation in organizations and UX/UI design

info.title: Secondary Education
info.description: In secondary school, I specialized in robotics, where I learned teamwork under pressure, design, and robot programming.

info.title: Community Manager and UX/UI Specialist
info.description: At Fortune Acoustics, my job is to make the digital experience friendlier and more effective for people. I am currently redesigning our online store for a more intuitive and attractive user interface. I also create landing pages to improve conversion. Additionally, I manage social media, creating engaging content that helps us increase reach and engagement.

info.title: Project Manager and Developer
info.description: Awarded at 'Innovatec 2024'. This Flutter app empowers visually impaired people through an AI assistant that 'sees' for them. My role: design an intuitive experience with clear voice, orienting vibrations, and high-contrast colors, while leading the technical team and delivering a human-centered narrative on inclusion to the jury.

proyectos.descripcion: UX/UI redesign of Fortune Acoustics' e-commerce to improve user experience and encourage purchases. The goal was to create a more modern and attractive interface to refresh the brand image and make navigation easier.

Design and development of a special landing page for promotions at Fortune Acoustics, intended as a support to the e-commerce. The page was designed to be attractive and easy to navigate, helping users quickly find promotions.

Design and development of a landing page for special courses by Fortune Acoustics and Nettcontrol. The interface was built with a modern and professional style, focusing on usability and clarity of information.

Design, development, and management of a mobile app project for visually impaired people, implementing an AI assistant that helps users navigate their environment. Winners of first place at Innovatec 2024 locally, third place regionally, and an honorable mention nationally. Visit the landing page created by MarcoTheBigCreator.
Design and development of a web app to help users manage their budget efficiently through AI-powered analysis. Winner of third place at HackDgo 2024.

contactInfo.title: Shall we work together?
contactInfo.description: If you’re interested in collaborating with me or have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out. I’m open to new opportunities and excited about the possibility of working together.
